name: Create Guild
description: Create a new guild. Returns a guild object on success. Fires a Guild Create Gateway event.

params.name: name
params.description: name of the guild

params.name: region
params.description: id

params.name: icon
params.description: base64 128x128 image for the guild icon

params.name: default_message_notifications
params.description: default

params.name: roles
params.description: new guild roles

params.name: channels
params.description: new guild's channels

params.name: afk_channel_id
params.description: id for afk channel

params.name: afk_timeout
params.description: afk timeout in seconds

params.name: system_channel_id
params.description: the id of the channel where guild notices such as welcome messages and boost events are posted

name: Get Guild

query.name: with_counts
query.description: when `true`, will return approximate member and presence counts for the guild

description: Returns the guild object for the given id. If with_counts is set to true , this endpoint will also return approximate_member_count and approximate_presence_count for the guild.

name: Get Guild Preview
description: Returns the guild preview object for the given id. If the user is not in the guild, then the guild must be lurkable.

name: Modify Guild
description: Modify a guild's settings. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the updated guild object on success. Fires a Guild Update Gateway event.

params.name: name
params.description: guild name

params.name: region
params.description: guild  id

params.name: default_message_notifications
params.description: default

params.name: afk_channel_id
params.description: id for afk channel

params.name: afk_timeout
params.description: afk timeout in seconds

params.name: icon
params.description: base64 1024x1024 png/jpeg/gif image for the guild icon

params.name: owner_id
params.description: user id to transfer guild ownership to

params.name: splash
params.description: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild splash

params.name: discovery_splash
params.description: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild discovery splash

params.name: banner
params.description: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild banner

params.name: system_channel_id
params.description: the id of the channel where guild notices such as welcome messages and boost events are posted

params.name: rules_channel_id
params.description: the id of the channel where Community guilds display rules and/or guidelines

params.name: public_updates_channel_id
params.description: the id of the channel where admins and moderators of Community guilds receive notices from Discord

params.name: preferred_locale
params.description: the preferred  of a Community guild used in server discovery and notices from Discord; defaults to "en-US

params.name: features
params.description: enabled guild features

params.name: description
params.description: the description for the guild, if the guild is discoverable

params.name: premium_progress_bar_enabled
params.description: whether the guild's boost progress bar should be enabled.

name: Delete Guild

response.value: Delete a guild permanently. User must be owner. Returns 204 No Content on success. Fires a Guild Delete Gateway event.

description: Delete a guild permanently. User must be owner. Returns 204 No Content on success. Fires a Guild Delete Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Channels
description: Returns a list of guild channel objects. Does not include threads.

name: Create Guild Channel
description: Create a new channel object for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_CHANNELS permission. If setting permission overwrites, only permissions your bot has in the guild can be allowed/denied. Setting MANAGE_ROLES permission in channels is only possible for guild administrators. Returns the new channel object on success. Fires a Channel Create Gateway event.

params.name: name
params.description: channel name

params.name: type
params.description: the

params.name: topic
params.description: channel topic

params.name: bitrate
params.description: the bitrate  of the voice channel

params.name: user_limit
params.description: the user limit of the voice channel

params.name: rate_limit_per_user
params.description: amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message ; bots, as well as users with the permission `manage_messages` or `manage_channel`, are unaffected

params.name: position
params.description: sorting position of the channel

params.name: permission_overwrites
params.description: the channel's permission overwrites

params.name: parent_id
params.description: id of the parent category for a channel

params.name: nsfw
params.description: whether the channel is nsfw

name: Modify Guild Channel Positions
description: Modify the positions of a set of channel objects for the guild. Requires MANAGE_CHANNELS permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires multiple Channel Update Gateway events.

params.name: id
params.description: channel id

params.name: position
params.description: sorting position of the channel

params.name: lock_permissions
params.description: syncs the permission overwrites with the new parent, if moving to a new category

params.name: parent_id
params.description: the new parent ID for the channel that is moved

name: List Active Threads

response.value: Returns all active threads in the guild, including public and private threads. Threads are ordered by their id , in descending order.

description: Returns all active threads in the guild, including public and private threads. Threads are ordered by their id , in descending order.

name: Get Guild Member
description: Returns a guild member object for the specified user.

name: List Guild Members

query.name: limit
query.description: max number of members to return

query.name: after
query.description: the highest user id in the previous page

description: Returns a list of guild member objects that are members of the guild.

name: Search Guild Members

query.name: query
query.description: Query string to match username and nickname against.

query.name: limit
query.description: max number of members to return

description: Returns a list of guild member objects whose username or nickname starts with a provided string.

name: Add Guild Member
description: Adds a user to the guild, provided you have a valid oauth2 access token for the user with the guilds.join scope. Returns a 201 Created with the guild member as the body, or 204 No Content if the user is already a member of the guild. Fires a Guild Member Add Gateway event.

params.name: access_token
params.description: an oauth2 access token granted with the `guilds.join` to the bot's application for the user you want to add to the guild

params.name: nick
params.description: value to set user's nickname to

params.name: roles
params.description: array of role ids the member is assigned

params.name: mute
params.description: whether the user is muted in voice channels

params.name: deaf
params.description: whether the user is deafened in voice channels

name: Modify Guild Member
description: Modify attributes of a guild member . Returns a 200 OK with the guild member as the body. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event. If the channel_id is set to null, this will force the target user to be disconnected from voice.

params.name: nick
params.description: value to set user's nickname to

params.name: roles
params.description: array of role ids the member is assigned

params.name: mute
params.description: whether the user is muted in voice channels. Will throw a 400 error if the user is not in a voice channel

params.name: deaf
params.description: whether the user is deafened in voice channels. Will throw a 400 error if the user is not in a voice channel

params.name: channel_id
params.description: id of channel to move user to

params.name: communication_disabled_until
params.description: when the user's  will expire and the user will be able to communicate in the guild again , set to null to remove timeout. Will throw a 403 error if the user has the ADMINISTRATOR permission or is the owner of the guild

name: Modify Current Member
description: Modifies the current member in a guild. Returns a 200 with the updated member object on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

params.name: nick
params.description: value to set user's nickname to

name: Modify Current User Nick

response.value: Modifies the nickname of the current user in a guild. Returns a 200 with the nickname on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

description: Modifies the nickname of the current user in a guild. Returns a 200 with the nickname on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

params.name: nick
params.description: value to set user's nickname to

name: Add Guild Member Role
description: Adds a role to a guild member . Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

name: Remove Guild Member Role
description: Removes a role from a guild member . Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

name: Remove Guild Member

response.value: Remove a member from a guild. Requires KICK_MEMBERS permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Member Remove Gateway event.

description: Remove a member from a guild. Requires KICK_MEMBERS permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Member Remove Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Bans
description: Returns a list of ban objects for the users banned from this guild. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permission.

name: Get Guild Ban
description: Returns a ban object for the given user or a 404 not found if the ban cannot be found. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permission.

name: Create Guild Ban

response.value: Create a guild ban, and optionally delete previous messages sent by the banned user. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Ban Add Gateway event.

description: Create a guild ban, and optionally delete previous messages sent by the banned user. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Ban Add Gateway event.

params.name: delete_message_days
params.description: number of days to delete messages for

params.name: reason
params.description: reason for the ban

name: Remove Guild Ban

response.value: Remove the ban for a user. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permissions. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Ban Remove Gateway event.

description: Remove the ban for a user. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permissions. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Ban Remove Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Roles
description: Returns a list of role objects for the guild.

name: Create Guild Role
description: Create a new role for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns the new role object on success. Fires a Guild Role Create Gateway event. All JSON params are optional.

params.name: name
params.description: name of the role

params.name: permissions
params.description: bitwise value of the enabled/disabled permissions

params.name: color
params.description: RGB color value

params.name: hoist
params.description: whether the role should be displayed separately in the sidebar

params.name: icon
params.description: the role's icon image

params.name: unicode_emoji
params.description: the role's unicode emoji as a

params.name: mentionable
params.description: whether the role should be mentionable

name: Modify Guild Role Positions
description: Modify the positions of a set of role objects for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a list of all of the guild's role objects on success. Fires multiple Guild Role Update Gateway events.

params.name: id
params.description: role

params.name: position
params.description: sorting position of the role

name: Modify Guild Role
description: Modify a guild role. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns the updated role on success. Fires a Guild Role Update Gateway event.

params.name: name
params.description: name of the role

params.name: permissions
params.description: bitwise value of the enabled/disabled permissions

params.name: color
params.description: RGB color value

params.name: hoist
params.description: whether the role should be displayed separately in the sidebar

params.name: icon
params.description: the role's icon image

params.name: unicode_emoji
params.description: the role's unicode emoji as a

params.name: mentionable
params.description: whether the role should be mentionable

name: Delete Guild Role

response.value: Delete a guild role. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Role Delete Gateway event.

description: Delete a guild role. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Role Delete Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Prune Count

query.name: days
query.description: number of days to count prune for

response.value: Returns an object with one 'pruned' key indicating the number of members that would be removed in a prune operation. Requires the KICK_MEMBERS permission.

description: Returns an object with one 'pruned' key indicating the number of members that would be removed in a prune operation. Requires the KICK_MEMBERS permission.

name: Begin Guild Prune
description: Begin a prune operation. Requires the KICK_MEMBERS permission. Returns an object with one 'pruned' key indicating the number of members that were removed in the prune operation. For large guilds it's recommended to set the compute_prune_count option to false , forcing 'pruned' to null . Fires multiple Guild Member Remove Gateway events.

params.name: days
params.description: number of days to prune

params.name: compute_prune_count
params.description: whether 'pruned' is returned, discouraged for large guilds

params.name: include_roles
params.description: role to include

params.name: reason
params.description: reason for the prune

name: Get Guild Voice Regions
description: Returns a list of voice region objects for the guild. Unlike the similar voice route, this returns VIP servers when the guild is VIP-enabled.

name: Get Guild Invites
description: Returns a list of invite objects (with invite metadata ) for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission.

name: Get Guild Integrations
description: Returns a list of integration objects for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission.

name: Delete Guild Integration
description: Delete the attached integration object for the guild. Deletes any associated webhooks and kicks the associated bot if there is one. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Integrations Update Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Widget Settings
description: Returns a guild widget settings object. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission.

name: Modify Guild Widget
description: Modify a guild widget settings object for the guild. All attributes may be passed in with JSON and modified. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the updated guild widget object.

name: Get Guild Widget
description: Returns the widget for the guild.

name: Get Guild Vanity URL
description: Returns a partial invite object for guilds with that feature enabled. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. code will be null if a vanity url for the guild is not set.

name: Get Guild Widget Image

query.name: style
query.description: style of the widget image returned

response.value: Returns a PNG image widget for the guild. Requires no permissions or authentication.

description: Returns a PNG image widget for the guild. Requires no permissions or authentication.

name: Get Guild Welcome Screen
description: Returns the Welcome Screen object for the guild. If the welcome screen is not enabled, the MANAGE_GUILD permission is required.

name: Modify Guild Welcome Screen
description: Modify the guild's Welcome Screen . Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the updated Welcome Screen object.

params.name: enabled
params.description: whether the welcome screen is enabled

params.name: welcome_channels
params.description: channels linked in the welcome screen and their display options

params.name: description
params.description: the server description to show in the welcome screen

name: Modify Current User Voice State
description: Updates the current user's voice state.

params.name: channel_id
params.description: the id of the channel the user is currently in

params.name: suppress
params.description: toggles the user's suppress state

params.name: request_to_speak_timestamp
params.description: sets the user's request to speak

name: Modify User Voice State
description: Updates another user's voice state.

params.name: channel_id
params.description: the id of the channel the user is currently in

params.name: suppress
params.description: toggles the user's suppress state
